feed.title: eScience for linking Arctic measurements and modeling
feed.subtitle: The 3rd course on Climate science at high latitudes - eScience for linking Arctic measurements and modeling will be held at Abisko Scientific Research Station from 15th until 24th of October 2019. It is coordinated by Paul Zieger (SU), Michael Schulz (UiO/MetNo), and Katja Lauri (UHEL).
